entry.title: Kevin!
entry.content:
Later this year (2018) I’ll be posting a tutorial on how to make an electric guitar using Fusion 360 and a CNC milling machine. The first step in all of this is to complete the excellent tutorial by EvanandKatelyn found here.

Here’s some footage of our CNC putting the finishing touches on Kevin.
entry.summary: Later this year (2018) I’ll be posting a tutorial on how to make an electric guitar using Fusion 360 and a CNC milling machine. The first step in all of this is to complete the excellent tutorial by EvanandKatelyn found here.

entry.title: Welcome!
entry.content: Hi. This page is an experiment in getting away from social media sites and managing my own content. Until I learn more about Jekyll and GitHub, this site is going to be a bit of a mess. Bear with me and you may be rewarded with thrilling stories of the stuff I make at Decatur Makers, a family-friendly makerspace in downtown Decatur, GA.
